description: Poor Aiden Jason, dealing with one Boynapped dom is bad enough, he has to contend with two. Ashton Bradley and Adam Watson waste no time in humiliating the poor lad. Covered in piss and beer his mouth and arse are abused with cocks and toys. The lad tries to fight back but it just gets him in even more trouble.
title: Adam Watson, Aiden Jason & Ashton Bradley
